channel.title: Change quick reply
channel.description: I think a full editor box instead of the quick reply would be nice when you select quick reply. Or at least a box that had a few smileys or a link to the smileys, maybe the bold, italic, underline, strike through, center, left aling, color, sie, and image/code/quote tags would be useful. I find a lot of times if I want to post a picture into the rs section I have to go to a full reply which just takes more time. It would be so much more efficient if you could click reply, click image button, put in link, click quick reply, bam your done.
